citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on
25-Apr-17.
Arrived at 10:00 am. Knocked on door and no response. Returned at approximately 11:00 and again at 12:00 no
response.
